bill.title: Medical Marijuana Program; Transfer of Responsibilities ($)
bill.description: Authorizes transfer of the medical use of marijuana program from the Department of Public Safety to the Department of Health. Requires joint reports to the Legislature. Establishes Medical Marijuana Registry Special Fund. Makes appropriation. (HB668 CD1)

referrals.name: Public Safety, Intergovernmental and Military Affairs

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to HLT, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 3
Re-referred to HLT/PBS, FIN, referral sheet 11
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT/PBS on Friday, 02-08-13 8:30AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Morikawa, Kobayashi, Woodson, Cheape; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Carroll, Jordan.

The committees on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Ing, Hashem, Nakashima, Takumi, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Yamane, McDermott.
Reported from HLT/PBS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 478) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Carroll, Coffman, Hanohano, Har, Kawakami, Ward excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-22-13 1:30PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Woodson, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Cullen, Tokioka; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 905) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-05-13.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Tokioka voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Fale, Ito, Ward voting no (3) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.

The committee(s) on HTH/PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 03-20-13 3:00PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Chun Oakland, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL/WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL/WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-05-13 11:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Ihara.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. Thielen, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kouchi.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Morikawa, Kobayashi, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Aquino.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Espero, Chun Oakland; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Hee, Slom.
